goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
indicator_name: Average tariffs faced by developing countries, least developed countries and small island developing States
target_name: Realize timely implementation of duty-free and quota-free market access on a lasting basis for all least developed countries, consistent with World Trade Organization decisions, including by ensuring that preferential rules of origin applicable to imports from least developed countries are transparent and simple, and contribute to facilitating market access
title: Average tariffs faced by developing countries, least developed countries and small island developing States
